description: This file defines a data model for movie scripts using Pydantic, and sets up an agent to generate such scripts with a specified model. It includes class definitions, external library imports, and agent invocation.

classes.name: MovieScript
classes.description: A Pydantic model representing the structure of a movie script, including setting, ending, genre, name, characters, storyline, and rating.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method of the Agent class used to generate and print a movie script based on the input location.
